p: Interestingly, Venturi et al. described a remarkable anti HSV-1 activity of the essential oil from Glechon spathulata and Glechon marifolia. Glechon marifolia oil’s main components are α-humulene at 23.3 % and β-caryophyllene at 32 %. The authors hypothesized that α-humulene could act by interfering at a later stage of the replicative cycle of the virus inside the cell [ 27].
